title: Friday AM Arktoons
author: VD
content_html:
Episode 2 of HYPERGAMOUSE, A Piece of Cheese, and Episode 2 of DYNAMITE THOR, The Force of DynamiteÂ are now live on Arktoons.

In addition to the image-format speedup, which will significantly improve performance for readers on slow mobile connections, episodes now have numbers and publishing dates.
content_text:
Episode 2 of HYPERGAMOUSE,
A Piece of Cheese
, and Episode 2 of DYNAMITE THOR,
The Force of Dynamite
are now live on Arktoons.
In addition to the image-format speedup, which will significantly improve performance for readers on slow mobile connections, episodes now have numbers and publishing dates.
